page.title: 05PAROCHIAL BOUNDARIES
page.content: It may be of interest to know that plans are going ahead to join the parish of Tredington and Stoke Orchard with Hardwicke (to give it its proper title) and the parish of Staverton and Boddington under one parish priest, who will live in the vicarage at Staverton. The two parishes will be independent of each other, but united in the sense of sharing their parish priest. Not one parish, but one benefiice. It will mean that when this happens the village of Tredington will lose its vicarage. It will be sold.
